doc.field: hydrology polygons: City of Norfolk GIS Datasets (Datastack)

This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided to the UVA Library's Scholars' Lab by the City of Norfolk GIS Team / Department of Public Works / Division of Surveys of the City of Norfolk, Virginia, USA, and is provided AS-IS with no guarantees as regards to its accuracy or temporal currency. It pertains primarily to the infrastructure, service zones, and land use within the City of Norfolk as well as related natural features. More detailed descriptions of the datasets and coding schemes can be found on the City of Norfolk's GIS page (see contact info). * // * The temporal extent of the datasets in the datastack is generally in the 2005 range, but some datasets may include data that originated earlier. * // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack (with non-exclusive list of included attributes): * Street Edges * Railroads * Driveways and Sidewalks (mini-transportation features) * Landmarks - incl. name, zoning type, taxable status * Utilities (points only) * Buildings and Structures (footprints only) * Multi-Service Facilities - incl. facility name, address, phone #. * Shelters * Planning Districts - incl. planning district name and #, and Commercial Area Revitalization Effort (CARE) areas. * Enterprise Zones * Business Districts * Bodies of Water: rivers, creeks, impoundments, ocean, shorelines (polygons) * Smaller Streams, Drainage Ditches, and Canals (lines) * Natural Areas * Recreation Areas * Topographic Elevation Contours - 1 ft. amsl contours. * Police Stations - incl. facility name, address, phone #. * Fire Stations * Public Schools - incl. school name, level, address, phone #. * Election Precincts - incl. voting precinct, congressional district, state house and senate districts, city wards and superwards, polling places and addresses. * // * These data were made available to the University of Virginia for educational and research uses only. Access is restricted to students, faculty and staff of the University of Virginia.
